title: Create a layer — Layer
code: Layer(type, id, source = NULL, paint = NULL, layout = NULL, ...)

title: Create a Marker — Marker
code: library(maplibre) marker = Marker(   lngLat = c(9.5,51.31667),   popup = list(text = "This is a marker",options = list(closeButton = F)),   color= "darkred" )  maplibre(mapOptions(center = c(9.5,51.31667)),zoom = 4) |>   add_marker(marker)  {"x":{"mapOptions":{"style":"https://basemaps.cartocdn.com/gl/dark-matter-gl-style/style.json","center":[9.5,51.31667],"zoom":4},"calls":[["addMarker",[{"lngLat":[9.5,51.31667],"popup":{"text":"This is a marker","options":{"closeButton":false}},"options":{"color":"darkred"}}]]]},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

Shiny bindings for maplibre — maplibre-shiny
text: Output render functions using maplibre within Shiny applications interactive Rmd documents.

title: Shiny bindings for maplibre — maplibre-shiny
code: maplibreOutput(outputId, width = "100%", height = "400px")  renderMaplibre(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)

title: Shiny bindings for maplibre — maplibre-shiny
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates maplibre env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.

what: Create a Map Object for MapLibre GL — maplibre
title: Create a Map Object for MapLibre GL — maplibre
Create a Map Object for MapLibre GL — maplibre
code: maplibre(   map_options = mapOptions(),   width = "100%",   height = NULL,   elementId = NULL,   ... )

title: Create a Map Object for MapLibre GL — maplibre
code: map_options <- mapOptions(   center = c(-123.1256, 49.24658),   hash = TRUE,   pitch = 0,   style = basemaps$carto$dark_matter,   test = NULL ) maplibre(map_options, zoom = 12) |>   add_control("NavigationControl", "top-left", showCompass = F)  {"x":{"mapOptions":{"style":"https://basemaps.cartocdn.com/gl/dark-matter-gl-style/style.json","center":[-123.1256,49.24658],"hash":true,"pitch":0,"zoom":12},"calls":[["addControl",["NavigationControl",{"showCompass":false},"top-left"]]]},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
